posts.text:
When things have a 1000 to 1 potential. They go up 10x very fast.   $hg $hgraf is likely to go viral in the investment world as it accomplishes the various milestones ahead.  EPA approval, Texas Gas plant deal, Nasdaq listing,  major contract wins. 

10k tonnes = $2 bln profit = probability of a further 100x move. 

So the next 10x will come just from people opening their eyes to this story. 

Ding ding ding! Will be ringing the Nasdaq bell soon… new eyeballs means new investors.
